front.title: Improving the Robustness of Stateless Address Autoconfiguration (SLAAC) to Flash Renumbering Events

abstract.t: In renumbering scenarios where an IPv6 prefix suddenly becomes invalid, hosts on the local network will continue using stale prefixes for an unacceptably long period of time, thus resulting in connectivity problems. This document improves the reaction of IPv6 Stateless Address Autoconfiguration to such renumbering scenarios.
